title: Billy Hamilton from Silverstein
itunes:title: Billy Hamilton from Silverstein
description:
In our 15th episode we speak with Billy Hamilton, the bassist of Silverstein and discuss Chipotle, what he's scared of after the band ends and Disneyland. We also review new records from Balance & Composure, Fleet Foxes and Foundation.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
